sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Creates empty location record for all the services which doesn't have any service location record.</description>
        <name>Create empty loc for workplace service</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[createEmptyServiceLocationRecords();

function createEmptyServiceLocationRecords() {

    try {

        var result = sn_fd.FlowAPI.getRunner().action('sn_wsd_case.create_empty_location_for_workplace_service').inBackground().run();

    } catch (ex) {
        var message = ex.getMessage();
        gs.error(message);
    }
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-03-04 14:17:12</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>9125cafe53912110d6f4ddeeff7b1249</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Create empty loc for workplace service</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">a1bd5de60f751010784dd2d92f767e96</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">a1bd5de60f751010784dd2d92f767e96</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_9125cafe53912110d6f4ddeeff7b1249</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-03-23 06:03:02</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
